<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update sys_domain="global" table="sys_script"> <sys_script action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"> <abort_action>false</abort_action> <access>package_private</access> <action_delete>false</action_delete> <action_insert>true</action_insert> <action_query>false</action_query> <action_update>true</action_update> <active>true</active> <add_message>false</add_message> <advanced>true</advanced> <change_fields>false</change_fields> <client_callable>false</client_callable> <collection>sn_prod_cat_rel_m2m_product_catalog_item</collection> <condition/> <description/> <execute_function>false</execute_function> <filter_condition/> <is_rest>false</is_rest> <message/> <name>Avoid Duplicate Entry</name> <order>100</order> <priority>100</priority> <rest_method/> <rest_method_text/> <rest_service/> <rest_service_text/> <rest_variables/> <role_conditions/> <script><![CDATA[(function executeRule(current, previous /*null when async*/) {
var productCatalogGr = new GlideRecord('sn_prod_cat_rel_m2m_product_catalog_item'); productCatalogGr.addQuery('product_model', current.product_model.sys_id); productCatalogGr.addQuery('catalog_item', current.catalog_item.sys_id); productCatalogGr.query(); if(productCatalogGr.hasNext()){ gs.addErrorMessage(gs.getMessage("Product Model and Catalog Item mapping already exists.")); current.setAbortAction(true); }
})(current, previous);]]></script> <sys_class_name>sys_script</sys_class_name> <sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by> <sys_created_on>2020-03-16 12:58:12</sys_created_on> <sys_domain>global</sys_domain> <sys_domain_path/> <sys_id>04c124d6536b00103a2eddeeff7b121a</sys_id> <sys_mod_count>0</sys_mod_count> <sys_name>Avoid Duplicate Entry</sys_name> <sys_overrides/> <sys_package display_value="Product Model and Catalog Items Relationship" source="sn_prod_cat_rel">0158b083b75304103a2e2397ee11a9ce</sys_package> <sys_policy/> <sys_scope display_value="Product Model and Catalog Items Relationship">0158b083b75304103a2e2397ee11a9ce</sys_scope> <sys_update_name>sys_script_04c124d6536b00103a2eddeeff7b121a</sys_update_name> <sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by> <sys_updated_on>2020-03-16 12:58:12</sys_updated_on> <template/> <when>before</when> </sys_script> <sys_translated_text action="delete_multiple" query="documentkey=04c124d6536b00103a2eddeeff7b121a"/> </record_update>
